reviewText: This movie is a masterpiece, it needs many viewing to see the incredible detail.  it needs a Region 1 restoration for us in the USA!  Apparently Tarantino had a showing of a restored version.  The Wikipedia entry for the film states that Cimino had to convince Kubrick that much of the NYC sets were on a backlot, Kubrick was said to have attended a Premiere.  It this is true then Cimino's genius is still not fully realized through all the Anti Cimino propaganda.
